modName: Clean Level 1 Main Quests Vanilla and DLCs Complete Save
summary: In this save only the main quests from vanilla and dlcs are completed , the rest of them aren't touched , not even 99.6% of the non-MQ locations found . So enjoy a world without main quests .
descriptionHtml:
[b] [size=3]First thing I want to say sorry for my bad english (I'm from Romania) .[/size]
[/b] 

[color= D2691E]Character's Name : Cristian

  Items : Only the unique ones you found by doing the main quests from vanilla and dlcs .

 Quests done : Main quests . 

 Quests undone : Every side-quest .

 Locations found : Only the ones from MQ plus 3 or 2 locations found by mistake .

  Shouts :
          Call Dragon 3/3
        Cal of Valor 3/3
       Clear Skies 3/3
      Dragonrend 3/3
     Fire Breath 1/3
    Storm Call 0/3
   Unrelenting Force 3/3
  Whirlwind Sprint 1/3
 Become Ethereal 0/3  
  Bend Will : 3/3
    Dragon Aspect 0/3
      Summon Durnehviir 0/3
         Drain Vitality 0/3 

 Spells : Flames 
             Heal
            Summon Arvak [/color]

[color=FF0000]Choices made :
 Etienne Rarnis released from Thalmor Embassy
 Malborn kept alive from Thalmor
 Markarth for Riften
 Markarth Jarl Switch: Jarl Igmund -> Thogvor Silver-Blood
 Riften Jarl Switch: Jarl Laila Law-Giver -> Maven Black-Briar
 Stormcloaks pay for the massacre of Imperial troops at Karthwastend
 Dawnguard victory over Volkihar .[/color]
 
[color=DEB887]Backstory : Two weeks after Harkon's defeat when you were exploring the Forgotten Valley a ball of incredible power hit you . You awaken in Fort Dawnguard, you have forgotten much about what has happened the only thing you can remember is the name of someone called Sam . Your skills and power have greatly weakened as you cannot remember even how to fight. Very soon after you woke up Serana told you that after 2 months since the day you went missing she found you unconscious near Icewater Jetty and brought you to Fort Dawnguard .[/color]
author: D4rkWo1f
